string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Changed rom name from Stock ROM Advanced to Asertion ROM
Blocked ads by adding the latest hosts file from AdAway
Removed Mobile Data toggle off Warning Dialogue
Removed signature verification - can install older app version over newer
Disabled scrolling cache across OS (for smoother scrolling)
Disabled safe media volume warning popup
Can use torch when battery is low, less than 5%
Added Gesture Anywhere - you can launch any app/activity/contact/folder/Tasker shortcut/Greenify Hibernate with any gesture
Added a invisible icon in status bar, behind the clock, which power off the screen when you touch and show Power Menu when you long touch
Added Potato Gradient - can choose 2 or 4 custom colors for status bar
Added A.O.K.P Ram Bar in Recent Panel
Added Omni Screen Recorder - add it from Home Screen > Widgets
Added Auto Start Management - select which apps start at boot
Added Clock and Date options: show/hide, custom color, enable/disable seconds, left/right, font style, show/shie AM/PM, show/hide date, date style, date format
Removed Knox info in Settings>About screen
Added Asertion ROM Control to control following options:
Battery Bar: show/hide, animation, style, size, color
[DELETED FOR NOW] Memory Cleaner: show/hide, custom color
Choose how many notifications shows on lockscreen: 2/3/4/5
Custom Carrier Text: show/hide, custom color
